plot: In a mock-up of his living room, the comedy sidekick invites an audience to guffaw at a selection of archive TV and video clips, inter-cut with his scripted reactions.
plot_en: In a mock-up of his living room, the comedy sidekick invites an audience to guffaw at a selection of archive TV and video clips, inter-cut with his scripted reactions.
plot_es: In a mock-up of his living room, the comedy sidekick invites an audience to guffaw at a selection of archive TV and video clips, inter-cut with his scripted reactions.
title: Paddy's TV Guide
